SEARCH

Class UserControllerTest

java.lang.Object
UserControllerTest
class UserControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive JUnit test suite for the UserController class.

This class utilizes Java Reflection to access private fields and methods. Updated with explicit data synchronization to prevent empty table errors.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab
